org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive

Class TwoWheelDriveController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive.DriveController
      • org.usfirst.frc2084.CMonster2014.drive.TwoWheelDriveController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.MotorSafety

    public class TwoWheelDriveController
extends DriveController
    Controls a robot that has two wheels, or (in most cases) two sides that each act as a unit, making the control the same as if the robot only had two wheels.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer
